Welcome to Thinkpol’s documentation!¶

thinkpol.client.client.upload_sample(host, port, path)¶

Accepts a host address, a port and a file name and uploads cognition snapshots from the file to the specified address.

Parameters

  • host (str) – the host we send the data to

  • port (int) – the port we send the data to

  • path (str) – the path of the file we process
